name: Fear (RotemHaim)
description:
Two siblings, home alone.

Bambino is the scared little brother who can't fall asleep, convinces that there's a monster lurking in the shadows. His older sister Sorella tries to ease his fears by patrolling the house for evil monsters, and destroying them' even though she doesn't believe monsters exist.

But what they do?

You play Fear, a scray shadow monster that sucks fear to keep alive, try to suck as much fear from Bambino and avoid Sorella's flashlight!

Controls:
